definition: to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: But she had come this far, she wasn't going to back out now.
sentences.chinese: 不過既然大老遠跑來，絕不會此刻罷手。

sentences.english: Eg. She'd never have stopped tiII she got what she wanted.
sentences.chinese: 因爲她不得到自己想要的東西是不會罷手的。

sentences.english: Eg. We will never stop until the experiment succeeds.
sentences.chinese: 試驗不成功，我們決不罷手。
但金裏奇並未因此罷手。
